about_the_game: Chester: Into The Light is a a full length story driven horror game about fear, and prison of the mind many of us struggle to escape from. Step into the shoes of James, a young child who's tormented by a horrific monster. James' severe fear of his once favorite plush toy named "Chester" has bled into his dreams, and is rapidly feeding off of his misery. Endure through the terror and uncover the truth about Chester, and what really lies within yourself.
